attributes.action: Stop Mp's getting a pay rise until after Brexit when they might then earn it.
attributes.background: We are currently fighting our MP's for the Brexit we voted for. We do not wish to grant a payrise to MP's that are working against the electorate. If and when Brexit is completed in full, then and only then should this be considered.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
